rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104471

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way. There are also petitions about Britain's membership of the EU, about the Government's immigration policy and about childcare.
